item.description:
Please Update your RSVPs for this event today if you plan to attend. This event has just been announced to several other meetup groups and is at overcapacity due to RSVPs from other groups. If your RSVP has been removed it is because you are a duplicate and already on the list with another gtoup.

The Red Sox Natives organized this event last week with guests from Boston Happy Hour and Social Fun with nearly 40 people attending. We had a blast!

We will return to the Greatest Bar on Sunday, November 27 at 3:15pm to watch the Patriots take on the Philadelphia Eagles.

The Greatest Bar has kindly reserved the 2nd floor lounge area for the Red Sox Natives and guests. Enter and go to the second floor. Look for the Red Sox Natives signs. Come early at 3:15pm to get yourself a prime seat and and enjoy some pre-game socializing.

Game time is 4:15pm.

The Greatest Bar is super conveniently located next to the TD Garden and on the Green and Orange Lines and Commuter Rail at North Station.  The Red and Blue Lines are within a 10 minute walk and street parking is also available if you arrive early.

Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO AND TIP YOUR SERVER. 

The Greatest Bar will be offering a $10.00 bucket of select beer and a cheese pizza to members and guests of our group. They are also offering $3.00 select beers for purchase.

The Greatest Bar has a minimum requirement to reserve the entire floor. Please RSVP now or ASAP as this will sell out since the Red Sox Natives are inviting several groups to join us including:

Social Fun (AO Duncan)

Fun with Alcohol (AO Duncan)

 

Space is limited.

We hope to see you there.

Frank and The Red Sox Natives
item.how_to_find_us: We have the 2nd floor lounge reserved for us. Look for the Red Sox Natives signs.
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party -- Patriots vs Philadelphia Eagles at The Greatest Bar
